DFA_Toolkit.DFA.getAcceptingStates¶

DFA.getAcceptingStates(self: DFA_Toolkit.DFA) → List[DFA_Toolkit.State]¶

Returns DFA’s accepting states as a list of State objects.

This method takes no arguments.
